hero.title: Create your world with the most powerful language – code!
hero.subtitle: CodeLab introduces young minds to the world of IT and coding through creative activities and inspiring mentors.

about1.title: Where Creativity Meets Code
about1.subtitle: Engaging workshops and activities help children learn programming in a fun and inspiring environment.

category1.title: Top Categories You Want to Learn

items.name: Educator Support
items.description: We provide full support for learners and teachers with modern resources.

items.name: Top Instructor
items.description: Learn from highly skilled instructors with real-world experience.

items.name: Interactive Classes
items.description: Classes are dynamic and hands-on for better understanding and engagement.

whyChoose.title: Why Choose Our Course?
whyChoose.subtitle: At CodeLab, we believe that introducing the next generation to technological skills is crucial for their future success.

items.name: Hands-on Exercises
items.description: Engage with concepts through practical exercises and projects that apply what you’ve learned.

items.name: Interactive Sessions
items.description: Interact with instructors and get the chance to ask questions.

items.name: Certificate of Completion
items.description: After finishing the course, you’ll receive a certificate validating your newly gained knowledge.

callToAction.title:
Достапни онлајн курсеви
и можности за учење
callToAction.text: Во CodeLab+ нудиме практични и забавни курсеви што му овозможуваат на секое дете да учи со сопствено темпо.

footer.aboutText: CodeLab+ empowers young learners with digital skills for the future.
